title: Clubs
body:
My Club is AwesomeCow and I am the owner of it, but when the clubs patch came after fixing them, I wasn't given back my club. My friend is in the club and has access to it though. If anyone can help me please contact me. 

-Blubble

replies.body:
This is an issue we're aware of and are investigating into a fix, but don't have one ready at the moment. I can't provide an ETA on when that fix will deploy, but our dev teams are hard at work to get it out.

You can keep up with updates on this issue [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016). Let me know if you have any questions.
